EmailTemplate.name: Decoding CFR.Send Email 3.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: Surprisingly Transformative.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Don’t forget to sign up <[[https://my.demio.com/ref/Qw4v0v1w3mQ2mnbm]]> for our IHL and NCR Self Check-out webinar and hear how this technology is making it simple for retailers to meet changing consumer needs. We’ll engage in an interactive discussion about what convenience shoppers want, their actual self-checkout usage trends—and how the technology unlocks other benefits for your business, from cash usage optimization to fraud prevention.Join the conversation! And see how self-checkouts help you meet modern day challenges while making change simple. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> Webinar Title: Making “Seamless” a Reality for Your C-store Date: October 15, 2020 Time: 2pm Eastern
Participants:
-
Greg Buzek, IHL Group - President
-
Steven O’Toole, NCR - VP of Convenience and Fuel Retail Sales
-
Alan Meyer, Meyer Oil Company - Chief Executive Officer ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]>
